Question
========

Which of the following bets makes the most money *in the long run*?

Answerlist
----------

* 0.90 chance of 10 euro profit, 0.05 chance of 50 euro and 0.05 chance of 5 euro loss.
* 0.90 chance of 5 euro profit, 0.05 chance of 100 euro and 0.05 chance of 100 euro loss.
* 0.90 chance of 0 euros profit, 0.05 chance of 250 euros and 0.05 chance of 250 euros loss.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.90 chance of 10 euro profit, 0.05 chance of 50 euro and 0.05 chance of 5 euro loss...: Correct
* 0.90 chance of 5 euro profit, 0.05 chance of 100 euro and 0.05 chance of 100 euro loss...: Incorrect
* 0.90 chance of 0 euro profit, 0.05 chance of 250 euro and 0.05 chance of 250 euro loss...: Incorrect
